title: 商店插件
author: jaycc
txt_content: 我用的快捷商店，1.6.2，现在玩家只能创30个箱子商店，怎么改为60

replies.author: jaycc
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
jaycc 发表于 2014-8-16 10:50
QuickShop
在quickshop文件夹的config里修改：这一块——#Limits the number of shops a person can create and own at a single time.（玩家能拥有的最大商店值）
limits:
    #Disable these if you're not using them! If this is false, the rest of this section is ignored
    use: false（设置为true）
    #The default number of shops players can make
    default: 10（普通玩家可以创建的商店数）
    #Players with these permissions can create these amounts of shops.
    ranks:
        #Anyone with 'quickshop.vip' permissions, can create 20 shops instead of 10.(拥有“quickshop.vip"这条权限的玩家可创建20个商店代替普通玩家的十个）也可以是其他任意数字，可修改。下面的项。
        quickshop.vip: 20 #Players with quickshop.vip can make 20 shops.

改完保存，reload
